alert.note: Alert for Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 3:54PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Perkins and northwestern Chase Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 254 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Imperial, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Venango, Chase and Brandon. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 44 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
